profile_data.headline: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

experience.description:
Advisor: Dr. Manik Varma
• Proposed and deployed a novel reformulation of Query AutoComplete as an XC task on Bing AI Chat and Search platforms which led to ∼1% gain in Click Through Rate (CTR) in production. On Bing AI Chat Platform, it led to an 8% increase in Keystrokes Saved Per Query), and 6% increase in acceptance rate for long queries. Work was accepted at ICLR 2024
• Highlighted the in-efficinecy of current pair-wise rankers in recommendation systems and devised an algorithm with 30x lower ranking latency than SOTA theoretical baseline, and 10% more accurate than production system on an offline set. Our algorithm led to 0.5% increase in Impression Yield Click Yield in en-markets in online A-B tests.
• Formulated and implemented a novel scoring method to use GPT-4 as a large scale oracle to denoise hard-negative for retriever training. This led to 30x increase in throughput, significantly reduced API costs and the trained retriever led to ∼0.6% absolute gain in clicks during online A-B tests in English markets.
experience.title: Research Fellow

experience.description:
Advisor: Prof. Ponnurangam Kumaraguru
• Proposed and designed algorithms for hate-speech and multimodal fake news detection. Work accepted at ACM Multimedia Asia 2021, and SNAM Journal 2024
• Released a corpus of ∼900K legal documents in Hindi, and proposed Multi-Task Learning Framework for Bail
prediction which used an auxiliary extractive summarization task for grounding the prediction. Work accepted at ACL Findings 2022.
• Designed and built the first version of multimodal search engine using huggingface and milvus.io for Factly which was used by thousands of users. 
• Proposed a Weighted sampling strategy for training an XLM model for english-hindi code mixed data. This led to 15% decrease in perplexity on eval set, and 2% increase in F1 score on POS Tagging task on LINCE Dataset.
experience.title: Undergraduate Researcher

experience.description: Worked on emotion-controlled conversational agents in task-oriented dialogue systems.
experience.title: Research Intern

experience.description:
• Desinged and refactored the code to implement Fac ̧ade design pattern for a system to account for variance in multi-currency ERP systems to improve stability of the platform.
• Developed a suite of Unit tests using Mockito and PowerMockito for automated testing with 94% code coverage.
experience.title: Summer Intern

certifications.name: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Advisors: Dr. Ponnurangam Kumaraguru, Professor, CS @ IIIT Hyderabad and Dr. Srijan Kumar, Assistant Professor, CS @ Georgia Tech.

• Analyzing users which are involved in countering misinformation and hate-speech on Online Social Media Platform from a computational social science perspective to understand their behavior.
projects.title: Misinformation and Hate-Speech based User Characterization

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Advisors: Dr. Ponnurangam Kumaraguru, Professor, CS @ IIIT Hyderabad and Dr. Rajesh Sharma, Associate Professor, CS @ University of Tartu, Estonia.

• Working towards a novel multimodal feature extractor model to incorporate image and text which can be used for various multimedia datasets.
projects.title: Multimodal Feature Extraction using Graph Neural Networks

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Advisors: Dr. Ponnurangam Kumaraguru, Professor, CS @ IIIT Hyderabad, Dr. Arnab Bhattacharya, Professor, CS @ IIT Kanpur and Dr. Ashutosh Modi, Assistant Professor, CS @ IIT Kanpur.

• Developing a Bail Prediction system in Indian regional languages using Indian Lower Courts to assist the Indian legal system.
• Implemented Longformer based regional language models along with hierarchical transformer models for long case documents
projects.title: Bail Prediction For Lower District Courts India in Indic Languages

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Advisors: Dr. Ponnurangam Kumaraguru, Professor, CS @ IIIT Hyderabad and Dr. Rajiv Ratn Shah, Assistant Professor, CS @ IIIT Delhi.

• Introduced a novel Inter-Modality Discordance-based fake news detection framework.
• Posed fake news detection as a joint-learning problem- the main task being binary classification with an auxiliary
task of modeling inter-modal dissimilarity using modified contrastive loss along with pre-trained BERT and VGG-19 models for feature extraction.
• Our approach achieved an average 6% increase in F1-score on the public benchmark datasets.
projects.title: Multi-Modal Fake News Detection

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Wrote code from scratch using no direct built-in function for 2D Convolution for Edge detection, Spatial Pyramid Pooling, Semantic segmentation, Circular Bounding Boxes, Super-pixel saliency, Interactive saliency, Otsu-Algorithm, Background subtraction from video, and many more.

Technologies used: NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-Image, Scikit-Learn, OpenCV, PyTorch, Python
projects.title: Computer Vision Concepts From Scratch

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Advisors: Dr. Ponnurangam Kumaraguru, Professor, CS @ IIIT Hyderabad.

• Trained a modified XLM (Cross-Lingual Language Model) from scratch on English-Hindi code-mixed data collected from social media.
• Proposed changes in the sampling strategy and the Masked Language Modelling (MLM) Task to better equip large transformer models for code-mixed data
projects.title: Language Model for Code-Mix Data

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Wrote code from scratch using just NumPy, SciPy for N-layer Neural Network, Grid Search, Bootstrapping, Gaussian Naive Bayes, Linear Regression, and Logistic Regression. Experimented with PyTorch and wrote code for transfer learning using AlexNet architecture and experimented with different activation functions.

Technologies used: NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, Python
projects.title: Machine Learning Concepts From Scratch

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Trained a deep-learning based building load-line prediction/ anomaly detection model. Used data from
Smart Buildings equipped with meters and sensors which are periodically collecting time-series data (ASHRAE Dataset – Kaggle).

Technologies used: Seq2Seq models, Generative Adversarial Networks, Tensorflow, Python
projects.title: Anomaly detection in building energy consumption

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Human emotion identification, classification, and analysis of EEG signals to various stimuli.

Technologies used: CNN and LSTM based Architectures, Python, Tensorflow, MATLAB, Signal Processing.
projects.title: EEG Based Emotion Classification

member.occupation: MS in Machine Learning @ CMU | Ex - Microsoft Research

projects.description:
Advisor: Dr.Ponnurangam Kumaraguru, Professor, CS@IIITHyderabad.
•Aimed at classifying whether different profiles on Social-Media-Platforms, belong to the same person or not.
•Created a heterogeneous graph-embedding with user-nodes and content-nodes based on NERTagging, Image-Captioning, and textual-stylometric techniques on the posted user-content.
projects.title: Content Driven User Identity Linkage
